StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: UPDATESENIORLECTURER
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source: CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE GRUPO10.UPDATESENIORLECTURER(pIDPerson IN NUMBER, pFirstName IN VARCHAR2, pSurname IN VARCHAR2,&lt;br/&gt;pTitle IN VARCHAR2, pAddress IN VARCHAR2, pPhone IN NUMBER, pPostcode IN NUMBER, pCampusLocation IN VARCHAR2, pIdBuilding IN NUMBER,&lt;br/&gt;pNumberOffice IN VARCHAR2, pStaffType IN VARCHAR2, pArea IN VARCHAR2, pLecturerType IN VARCHAR2, pNumberPhd IN NUMBER, pNumberMaster IN NUMBER,&lt;br/&gt;pNumberHonours IN NUMBER) AS&lt;br/&gt;BEGIN &lt;br/&gt; UPDATE SeniorLecturer_table lecS&lt;br/&gt; SET lecS.surname = pSurname,&lt;br/&gt; lecS.firstName = pFirstName,&lt;br/&gt; lecS.title = pTitle,&lt;br/&gt; lecS.address = pAddress,&lt;br/&gt; lecS.phone = pPhone,&lt;br/&gt; lecS.postcode = pPostcode,&lt;br/&gt; lecS.campusLocation = pCampusLocation,&lt;br/&gt; lecS.idBuilding = pIdBuilding,&lt;br/&gt; lecS.numberOffice = pNumberOffice,&lt;br/&gt; lecS.staffType = pStaffType,&lt;br/&gt; lecS.area = pArea,&lt;br/&gt; lecS.lectureType = pLecturerType,&lt;br/&gt; lecS.numberPhd = pNumberPhd,&lt;br/&gt; lecS.numberMaster = pNumberMaster,&lt;br/&gt; lecS.numberHonours = pNumberHonours&lt;br/&gt; WHERE lecS.idPerson = pIDPerson;&lt;br/&gt;END updateSeniorLecturer;
